post:
I'm not a hosting company, simply a guy looking to save some money on his dedicated server bill as I barely use 1% of the servers capacity.

I don't have any billing software, support (tho I'd help you as much as I can) etc.

I run Proxmox on the server so I'd simply give you an account for you to manage your VM/VMs.

The server has the following specs:
Dual E5-2420 ([http://ark.intel.com/products/64617/Intel-Xeon-Processor-E5-2420-15M-Cache-1_90-GHz-7_20-GTs-Intel-QPI](http://ark.intel.com/products/64617/Intel-Xeon-Processor-E5-2420-15M-Cache-1_90-GHz-7_20-GTs-Intel-QPI))
32GB RAM
1Gbit/s connection (100TB)
4x1TB  (RAID10)

Located @ Evoswitch DC (Leaseweb) in NL.

So, if anyone is interested, contact me and we'd work something out :)
